etymologies: early 17th century: from Spanish, from Aymara or Quechua

definitions: a small South American rodent with soft gray fur and a long bushy tail.

notes.text: Genus Chinchilla, family Chinchillidae: two species, in particular C. lanigera

shortDefinitions: small South American rodent with soft gray fur

definitions: a cat or rabbit of a breed with silver-gray or gray fur.
shortDefinitions: cat or rabbit of breed with silver-gray or gray fur

definitions: the highly valued fur of the chinchilla, or of the chinchilla rabbit.
shortDefinitions: highly valued fur of chinchilla, or of chinchilla rabbit
